alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 22 at 7:58PM MDT until May 23 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Trail Creek at Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Trail Creek Ketchum 7.0 6.6 Mon 10 am MDT &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-232200- /O.CON.KPIH.FL.A.0006.000000T0000Z-230523T2200Z/ /TCKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 758 PM MDT Mon May 22 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Trail Creek at Ketchum. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Near bankfull from near Corral Creek and Trail Creek to the confluence of the Big Wood River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
